name: Gemfall: Die With your Gems
description:
Collect Gems on the screen to increase your score while destroying the tiles underneath, Slowly the map becomes a dizzying maze of pits. How long can you run the tightrope before tripping down a pit of your own greed?

I made this game for myself, I use it as a kind of training for my own impulsive behavior. I've played it hundreds of times for the past year.

The game is a practice of patience, of self control, and of understanding your limits. The moment you get too eager you end up accidently turning into a pit. This game seems relentlessly hard at first ,impossible to beat, and yet if you train yourself to notice when your attention is out of focus, when you aren't ready. If you take that time to take a break, think ahead, think of the consequences before you act. you can get further.

There is a unique, one of a kind, real material, special reward for the KING who can master the game and attain the game's highest rank first. I'll update the page if/when the KING reveals himself.

After 4 years The KINGS have revealed themselves. JenneMK and SUPERCHUNK have  proven themselves KINGS of gemfall. 

If you enjoyed Gemfall Please Go play its sucessor Picking Flowers
